Articles.Content:
This a craft i originally made in 0.20 (Ancient ksp) i rebuilt it for 0.25 - 0.9, It's not the best ship but it is a great orbital shuttle, And it's low mass makes it a great addition to any interplanetary vessel,

Here is a screenshot:

Download: http://www./download/udbd5dwy8df2a3o/Centauri_MkIV.craft

This ship requires "Kerbal engineer redux" by cybutek

And Rasterprop monitor by Mihara

Rasterprop monitor is licensed under GNU GPLv3.

Kerbal Engineer redux is licensed under: Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 3.0 Unported License.

Just so you know, if you take the KER computer off a rocket it will work just fine, and since RasterPropMonitor doesn't actually change the .craft in any way, take off the KER computer and it's stock.
